Package: de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.util

[Groovy] Class Util

    • de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.util.Util

    • This class contains some static utility methods for DOM handling (like read and write) and for validation.

      Authors:
      cmahnke

        • @TypeChecked static String getRootNamespace(URL xml)

          Returns the namespace of the root element of the given URL Make sure that the parser being used is namespace aware.

          returns:
          the namespace URI as String
          Parameters:
          xml - the URL of the document which root namespace should be retrived.
          See Also:
          getRootNamespace(org.w3c.dom.Document)

        • @TypeChecked static String getRootNamespace(Document doc)

          Returns the namespace of the root element of the given Document#+ Make sure that the parser being used is namespace aware.

          returns:
          the namespace URI as String
          Parameters:
          doc - the Document which root namespace should be retrived.

        • @TypeChecked static Document loadDocument(URL xml)

          Loads a DOM Document from an URL. This is just a wrapper for loadDocument

          Returns:
          the loaded DOM Document
          Parameters:
          xml - the URL of the document to be loaded
          See Also:
          loadDocument(InputStream)

          Loads a DOM Document from an InputStream

          Returns:
          the loaded DOM Document
          Parameters:

        • static def sourceToString(Source source)

          Returns a given Source as String (depending on implementation) May even return null if the source is not supported Supported are SAXSource, DOMSource and StreamSource

          returns:
          the source as String
          Parameters:
          Source - the Source

          Writes a DOM Document to the given OutputStream

          Parameters:
          doc - the Document to be written
          out - the OutputStream where the Document will be written to

        • @TypeChecked static void writeDocument(Document doc, File file)

          Writes a DOM Document to the given File

          Parameters:
          doc - the Document to be written
          file - the File where the Document will be written to
          See Also:
          (org.w3c.dom.Document Document,java.io.OutputStream)

        • @TypeChecked static void writeDocument(Document doc, URL url)

          Writes a DOM Document to the given URL. Please not that this only works for local URLs (with file:// prefix)

          Parameters:
          doc - the Document to be written
          url - the URL where the Document will be written to
          See Also:
          (org.w3c.dom.Document Document,java.io.OutputStream)
          (org.w3c.dom.Document Document,java.io.File)
